children.text: The set out of this building appears to be different from the construction documents we were provided.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 2.03 Setting out the site states that

‘A building set out is defective where the set out has failed to comply with the requirements of the approved drawings, the allotment Certificate of Title, planning or development approval, relevant planning overlays and schemes and building regulations’ .
This must be properly investigated and rectified in accordance with the above.
